attributes.action: reduce the number of Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As more power is devolved to Europe and the Scottish and Welsh Assemblies, and seemingly, this Government is intent on introducing legislation without reference to the House of Commons, the number of M.P's should be dramatically reduced to reflect the lack of power of the House.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
